meanings.sent1: The multilevel cake had different flavors on each layer.
meanings.sent2: The multilevel building had offices on various floors.
meanings.sent3: The multilevel parking lot confused the drivers with its many levels.
meanings.sent4: Her multilevel personality revealed different aspects at different times.
meanings.sent5: The multilevel maze challenged visitors with its intricate design.

meanings.definition: Involving or consisting of multiple levels.
meanings.sent1: The multilevel marketing strategy targeted customers at different levels.
meanings.sent2: The multilevel approach to education catered to students with varying abilities.
meanings.sent3: The multilevel game kept players engaged with its diverse challenges.
meanings.sent4: His multilevel thinking allowed him to see issues from various perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The multilevel organization structure ensured efficient communication across departments.
